836340.name: Qinoto
836340.description:
Qinoto is a story-based puzzle adventure that introduces innovative gameplay to the existing puzzle game genre, where you can fold the world like paper to reveal secrets that advance the story.

Crease, fold and explore the beautiful world of Qinoto, to help Qinoto the little fox solve visual mysteries and quests to uncover her identity.

Inspired by MAD Fold-ins, every puzzle in Qinoto is a uniquely crafted and painted illustration like pages of a storybook.

Help this lost little fox and her friends through your magic touch.
836340.supported_languages:
英语*, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
